metadata.synopsis:
All guards at the checkpoint point the player to the guard with this dialog. He is an evil, nasty character who has no reason to go easy on the player. Should ooze disdain. This is the first goblin we meet and their weasly, cruel, wicked nature should stand out.
The goblin will let a non-allied player in only if they smear worg shit on their face. Yuck.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -81.379; 16.292; 3564. Talk with Sentinel Olak

3.speaker: Sentinel Olak
3.context: InternalNodeContext: haven't met the guards yet, underdark (not drow)NodeContext: Goblin's talking to his worg (big gross wolf). Evil character, not a nice person.

146.speaker: Sentinel Olak
146.text: Only funnin'. Got word from Moonrise?
146.context: NodeContext: Player is an ally to goblins. Goblin is still unpleasant but is relatively friendly toward player.

1.speaker: Sentinel Olak
1.text: Only funnin'. Got word from Moonrise?
1.context: NodeContext: Player is an ally to goblins. Goblin is still unpleasant but is relatively friendly toward player.

39.speaker: Gale
39.text: Let's try to be diplomatic, shall we? Goblins don't come by the handfuls, but by the dozens.

9.speaker: Sentinel Olak
9.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

120.speaker: Narrator
120.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

15.speaker: Player
15.text: My message is for whoever's in charge - not you.

81.speaker: Sentinel Olak
81.text: Right. Dror Ragzlin's inside, in through the temple.

147.speaker: Sentinel Olak
147.text: Right. Dror Ragzlin's inside, in through the temple.

158.text: Don't know Dror Ragzlin's name? Bit odd, don't you think, lads?
158.context: NodeContext: Player tried to deceive goblin. Goblin doesn't WANT to fight player, but is performing guard duty after all.

179.speaker: Sentinel Olak
179.text: Don't know Dror Ragzlin's name? Bit odd, don't you think, lads?
179.context: NodeContext: Player tried to deceive goblin. Goblin doesn't WANT to fight player, but is performing guard duty after all.

215.speaker: Sentinel Olak
215.text: Where you goin'? Camp's that way, idiot.

123.speaker: Player
123.text: Attack him. This is a waste of time.

154.speaker: Narrator
154.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*
154.context: NodeContext: Goblin realizing Player is a superior to him. HAs a reaction of fear and deference.

56.speaker: Player
56.context: NodeContext: Goblin realizing Player is a superior to him. HAs a reaction of fear and deference.

107.speaker: Sentinel Olak
107.text: Of course! 'Scusin' me; didn't know who you was.
107.context: NodeContext: Goblin realizing Player is a superior to him. HAs a reaction of fear and deference.

220.speaker: Narrator
220.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
220.context: NodeContext: Player is a superior to the goblin, and the goblin knows it. He is deferential.

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*
54.context: NodeContext: Player is a superior to the goblin, and the goblin knows it. He is deferential.

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*
31.context: NodeContext: Player is a superior to the goblin, and the goblin knows it. He is deferential.

115.speaker: Sentinel Olak
115.text: Stand down, lads! We got a True Soul comin' through!
115.context: NodeContext: Player is a superior to the goblin, and the goblin knows it. He is deferential.

182.speaker: Sentinel Olak
182.context: NodeContext: Player is a superior to the goblin, and the goblin knows it. He is deferential.

130.speaker: Narrator
130.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

155.speaker: Narrator
155.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

127.speaker: Narrator
127.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

168.speaker: Narrator
168.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

85.speaker: Player
85.context: NodeContext: He senses me trying to control his mind, but I've failed. He's semi-confused but mostly angry.

128.speaker: Sentinel Olak
128.context: NodeContext: He senses me trying to control his mind, but I've failed. He's semi-confused but mostly angry.

63.context: NodeContext: He senses me trying to control his mind, but I've failed. He's semi-confused but mostly angry.

125.speaker: Sentinel Olak
125.context: NodeContext: He senses me trying to control his mind, but I've failed. He's semi-confused but mostly angry.

172.speaker: Sentinel Olak
172.text: Lads! This'n's trying to scramble my brains!
172.context: NodeContext: I failed at controlling his mind. He and his fellow guards go hostile at this point.

159.speaker: Narrator
159.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

8.speaker: Sentinel Olak
8.context: InternalNodeContext: after we met the guard and got the accessNodeContext: Unfriendly. We got access, but guard isn't particularly happy to see us.

40.speaker: Sentinel Olak
40.text: I don't want trouble - learned my lesson. Can still taste it on me gums...
40.context: InternalNodeContext: This hasmet greeting if the player successfully intimidated Olak into eating dung.

47.speaker: Sentinel Olak
47.context: InternalNodeContext: we met the guards, but didn't get the access. Fallback node.NodeContext: player already failed once to gain access to camp. Goblin is in no mood to deal with player again.

59.speaker: Sentinel Olak
59.text: Shove over, Klaw! Drow comin' through.
59.context: InternalNodeContext: haven't met the guards yet, drowNodeContext: Goblin's talking to his worg (big gross wolf). Evil character, not a nice person.

71.speaker: Sentinel Olak
71.context: InternalNodeContext: after we met the guard and got the accessNodeContext: Deferential. Player used psyonics on the goblin, goblin respects player

88.speaker: Sentinel Olak
88.context: InternalNodeContext: haven't met the guards yet, drowNodeContext: Showing deference to player, who's a drow. But goblins are not used to showing deference and Olak gets it wrong.

131.speaker: Sentinel Olak
131.context: InternalNodeContext: haven't met the guards yet, not drowNodeContext: Goblin's talking to his worg (big gross wolf). Evil character, not a nice person.

35.speaker: Sentinel Olak
35.text: Unless you got another reason to be here, feck-shite.
35.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player. Dripping with disdain.

110.speaker: Sentinel Olak
110.text: Unless you got another reason to be here, feck-shite.
110.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player. Dripping with disdain.

196.speaker: Gale
196.text: Let's try to be diplomatic, shall we? Goblins don't come by the handfuls, but by the dozens.
196.context: NodeContext: He's just discovered that we're important, and is trying to make up for being rude to us. Nervous, hoping there won't be repercussions

190.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*
190.context: NodeContext: He's just discovered that we're important, and is trying to make up for being rude to us. Nervous, hoping there won't be repercussions

94.context: NodeContext: He's just discovered that we're important, and is trying to make up for being rude to us. Nervous, hoping there won't be repercussions

22.text: I'm looking for someone named Halsin.
22.context: NodeContext: He's just discovered that we're important, and is trying to make up for being rude to us. Nervous, hoping there won't be repercussions

144.speaker: Sentinel Olak
144.text: Good for you, mate. Now get out of my sight before my worg rips you a new hole.

139.speaker: Player
139.text: I'm a messenger - here to see Minthara.
139.context: NodeContext: He's just discovered that we're important, and is trying to make up for being rude to us. Nervous, hoping there won't be repercussions

37.speaker: Sentinel Olak
37.text: Ah, right! Beg pardon - gotta give all visitors the ol' squinty eye, y'know?
37.context: NodeContext: He's just discovered that we're important, and is trying to make up for being rude to us. Nervous, hoping there won't be repercussions

90.speaker: Sentinel Olak
90.text: Go on in and have a drink for me, eh?

206.speaker: Player
206.text: Have you seen a druid named Halsin?

95.speaker: Sentinel Olak
95.text: Go on in and have a drink for me, eh?

183.speaker: Player
183.context: NodeContext: I've succeeded in controlling his mind. He's confused but positive.

11.speaker: Player
11.context: NodeContext: I've succeeded in controlling his mind. He's confused but positive.

205.context: NodeContext: I've succeeded in controlling his mind. He's confused but positive.

30.speaker: Sentinel Olak
30.context: NodeContext: Didn't realize you were important. He's embarrassed, blames his worg. Gets angry at her, boots the worg in the chest and turned to his comrades.*

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
27.context: NodeContext: Full of deference to you.

133.speaker: Sentinel Olak
133.text: Easy, lads! We got a True Soul comin' through!
133.context: NodeContext: Full of deference to you.

164.speaker: Player
164.text: Tell me, what can I expect inside?
164.context: InternalNodeContext: Player now knows 3 goblin leaders.

45.speaker: Sentinel Olak
45.text: Lads're celebrating the raid on Waukeen's Rest. Captured a duke, we did! All the way from the city.
45.context: InternalNodeContext: Player now knows 3 goblin leaders.

191.speaker: Sentinel Olak
191.text: I'm sure the higher-ups'll make sure you get the best of the spoils, your excelness. The boss is in the temple inside. Minthara, too. A-and Priestess Gut can show you how many new recruits we got!
191.context: InternalNodeContext: Player now knows 3 goblin leaders.

214.speaker: Player
214.text: I hear wearing the local 'war colours' is the price of entry.
214.context: CinematicNodeContext: Olak takes dung and smears it on her own face.

149.speaker: Sentinel Olak
149.text: Heh. Just a bit of fun.
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: Olak takes dung and smears it on her own face.

186.speaker: Player
186.text: Fun indeed. Why don't you get in on it?
186.context: CinematicNodeContext: Olak takes dung and smears it on her own face.

122.speaker: Sentinel Olak
122.text: True Soul, I don't think... I...
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Olak takes dung and smears it on her own face.

162.context: CinematicNodeContext: Olak takes dung and smears it on her own face.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: I don't find it particularly funny. So you'll stop.

221.speaker: Sentinel Olak
221.text: Y-yes, True Soul. I promise. Never again.

211.speaker: Player
211.text: Hah! An excellent remedy for a boring afternoon.

104.speaker: Sentinel Olak
104.text: Hear, hear, my good True Soul!

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I'm looking for a druid named Halsin. Where is he?

34.speaker: Sentinel Olak
34.text: Don't know any Halsin, your excelness.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: I heard he was captured breaking into this very camp.

62.speaker: Sentinel Olak
62.text: Oh, one of them thieves? If he ain't dead, he's in the pits with the rest of 'em.

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

165.speaker: Narrator
165.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

224.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

91.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

166.text: Lads! This'n's trying to scramble my brains!
166.context: NodeContext: I failed at controlling his mind. He and his fellow guards go hostile at this point.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: To offer my sword to your boss. You can be my first demonstration, if you like.
119.context: NodeContext: Blames worg for his bad attitude.The goblin kicks at the worg and turns to her comrades.*

103.speaker: Player
103.text: I'm a hired sword - employer's inside. Stand aside. Now.
103.context: NodeContext: Blames worg for his bad attitude.The goblin kicks at the worg and turns to her comrades.*

208.speaker: Sentinel Olak
208.context: NodeContext: Blames worg for his bad attitude.The goblin kicks at the worg and turns to her comrades.*

170.context: NodeContext: Blames worg for his bad attitude.The goblin kicks at the worg and turns to her comrades.*

97.speaker: Sentinel Olak
97.context: NodeContext: Blames worg for his bad attitude.The goblin kicks at the worg and turns to her comrades.*

76.speaker: Sentinel Olak
76.text: She's a little overexcited. Been a busy day. Lads're celebratin'.
76.context: NodeContext: Ingratiating self to player. Talking about worg, hoping to escape player's wrath.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: I could best all of your sentinels with my bare hands. Let me pass.
126.context: NodeContext: He's impressed. He's a worg expert so your knowledge appeals to him, but he doesn't want to make it too easy for you.

129.speaker: Player
129.text: Beautiful animal. Does she belong to the Nordiland worgata family?
129.context: NodeContext: He's impressed. He's a worg expert so your knowledge appeals to him, but he doesn't want to make it too easy for you.

163.speaker: Sentinel Olak
163.context: NodeContext: He's impressed. He's a worg expert so your knowledge appeals to him, but he doesn't want to make it too easy for you.

26.speaker: Sentinel Olak
26.context: NodeContext: He's impressed. He's a worg expert so your knowledge appeals to him, but he doesn't want to make it too easy for you.

153.speaker: Sentinel Olak
153.text: Dumb as a rock, but world class at tearin' the throats outta wee ones, she is.
153.context: NodeContext: Bit of affection, he's talking about his dog. Still with a hint of malice, though.

111.speaker: Sentinel Olak
111.text: Rest of her litter's inside, in the pens. Beautiful beasts.
111.context: NodeContext: Bit of affection, he's talking about his dog. Still with a hint of malice, though.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: I've never seen a pack up close - always wanted to.
92.context: NodeContext: Said greasily. He's playing a trick on the player.

178.speaker: Sentinel Olak
178.text: Be a shame if you came all this way without havin' a look. But I can't let you pass just like that.
178.context: NodeContext: Said greasily. He's playing a trick on the player.

195.speaker: Sentinel Olak
195.text: Celebratin' a raid, we are. You'll need to wear our war colours.
195.context: NodeContext: Said greasily. He's playing a trick on the player.

171.speaker: Sentinel Olak
171.text: Nice dab o' this across the mug oughta do it.
171.context: CinematicNodeContext: *He pointed to a steaming pile of worg dung at his feet.*NodeContext: Pointing to worg shit as he says this. Stifling an evil laugh. He's told the player to smear shit in their face.

203.speaker: Player
203.context: NodeContext: Player has agreed to smear shit on their face. He's full of delight, stifling his laughter.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Why not. Got any designs in mind?
18.context: NodeContext: Player has agreed to smear shit on their face. He's full of delight, stifling his laughter.

32.speaker: Sentinel Olak
32.context: NodeContext: Player has agreed to smear shit on their face. He's full of delight, stifling his laughter.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Should've just let me pass. Now you're going to eat worg turds.
84.context: NodeContext: Laughes at the start, but quickly sobers up as he realises the player is serious (eat worg dung)

0.speaker: Sentinel Olak
0.context: NodeContext: Laughes at the start, but quickly sobers up as he realises the player is serious (eat worg dung)

209.speaker: Sentinel Olak
209.text: Nah, you're all hot air. Nice bit of war paint'll put you in your place.
209.context: NodeContext: Rallying, trying to stand up to the barbaria player/.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Scoop up the warm dung and fling it at Olak's face.
72.context: NodeContext: Player threw dung at Olak but missed. He's pissed. Hard 'g' in 'ranga'

185.speaker: Sentinel Olak
185.text: Hey! Watch it, you daft ranga!
185.context: NodeContext: Player threw dung at Olak but missed. He's pissed. Hard 'g' in 'ranga'

207.speaker: Sentinel Olak
207.text: Hey! Watch it, you daft ranga!
207.context: NodeContext: Player threw dung at Olak but missed. He's pissed. Hard 'g' in 'ranga'

142.speaker: Sentinel Olak
142.context: NodeContext: Gleefully enjoying your misery; he's asking you to smear shit on your face.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Grimace and do what you have to do.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's laughing, gleeful at my miseryNodeContext: I did as he asked and smeared shit on my face. He's gleeful at humiliating me.

42.speaker: Sentinel Olak
42.text: HA! Hahaha! I can't believe you did it! You stupid idiot!
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's laughing, gleeful at my miseryNodeContext: I did as he asked and smeared shit on my face. He's gleeful at humiliating me.

132.speaker: Sentinel Olak
132.text: Go on, mate. Enjoy the festivities. You earned it!
132.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's laughing, gleeful at my misery, said with faux sincerityNodeContext: SAid between laughter. I humiliated myself for his pleasure so he's happy enough.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I'm looking for someone named Halsin.

80.speaker: Sentinel Olak
80.text: Who? If he ain't one of us, and if he's here, he's down in the pits.

198.speaker: Sentinel Olak
198.text: Save the druid if you must. If we spill goblin blood on the way, all the better.

161.speaker: Lae'zel
161.text: Save the druid if you must. If we spill goblin blood on the way, all the better.

187.speaker: Gale
187.text: 'Down in the pits', no less. Sounds ominous among creatures that love bloodsports. Better step to it.

28.speaker: Karlach
28.text: Sounds rancid. Let's see if we can get him out of there.

87.speaker: Astarion
87.text: If this is the state of their camp, how bad must 'the pits' be?

184.speaker: Wyll
184.text: 'Down in the pits'? Either Halsin's in a foul mood, or he awaits rescue. Likely both.

73.speaker: Shadowheart
73.text: 'The pits'...? He couldn't be somewhere pleasant-sounding, could he? Better still be alive.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Sounds festive in there. I do enjoy a party.

194.speaker: Player
194.text: That noise coming from behind you: good or bad?

116.speaker: Sentinel Olak
116.text: We're celebratin' a raid. No better time in camp than this.

98.speaker: Sentinel Olak
98.text: Get yourself a bit of fun before it dries up.

192.speaker: Sentinel Olak
192.text: Ripped the guts outta Waukeen's Rest, we did. Inns are good fer guttin'.

173.speaker: Sentinel Olak
173.text: Lads even captured some duke. Worth celebratin', that is.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Smear the dung across your face. It's not your first time.
41.context: NodeContext: I just threw shit at him. This should be an emotional, furious response. He's about to attack.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: Wink, gather the dung, and fling it at all four guards.
83.context: NodeContext: I just threw shit at him. This should be an emotional, furious response. He's about to attack.

216.speaker: Sentinel Olak
216.text: Blech! Hope that was worth it, deadie.
216.context: NodeContext: I just threw shit at him. This should be an emotional, furious response. He's about to attack.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: That's nature's bounty. Helps the trees grow. Eat it, or else.

60.speaker: Player
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cowering. Glances down towards worg dung on the ground on 'ugh', then reluctantly crouches down.NodeContext: Cowed. Knows he's going to have to eat worg dung to avoid a fight

225.speaker: Sentinel Olak
225.text: A-all right! All right! Calm down, I'll do it... just give me a moment to... ugh...
225.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cowering. Glances down towards worg dung on the ground on 'ugh', then reluctantly crouches down.NodeContext: Cowed. Knows he's going to have to eat worg dung to avoid a fight

143.speaker: Sentinel Olak
143.text: A-all right! All right! Calm down, I'll do it... just give me a moment to... ugh...
143.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cowering. Glances down towards worg dung on the ground on 'ugh', then reluctantly crouches down.NodeContext: Cowed. Knows he's going to have to eat worg dung to avoid a fight

101.speaker: Sentinel Olak
101.text: Absolute preserve me... offh... UGGH - it's still warm... hurrph!
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Olak is crouched down while the player observes. He retches and gags as he's forced to eat worg dung out of frame. The player and companions react.NodeContext: Gagging and retching as he's forced to eat worg dung

16.speaker: Sentinel Olak
16.text: Bleeugh. It's gone. Are we done...?
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Straightens up and wipes his mouth with the back of his handNodeContext: Disgusted, half-pleading.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: I'm looking for someone named Halsin.
67.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

210.speaker: Sentinel Olak
210.text: Hal-who? Dunno, might be he's the prisoner down in the pits.
210.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Sounds festive in there. I do enjoy a party.
89.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

160.speaker: Sentinel Olak
160.text: Goblin parties ain't for everyone... but I reckon you'll manage.
160.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

141.speaker: Player
141.text: That noise coming from behind you: good or bad?
141.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

113.speaker: Sentinel Olak
113.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

24.speaker: Sentinel Olak
24.text: We're celebratin' a raid. Set Waukeen's Rest ablaze - caught ourselves a duke an' all.
24.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

193.speaker: Player
193.text: Unless you want seconds, we're done here.
193.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

44.speaker: Sentinel Olak
44.text: No! No more for me. On you go.
44.context: NodeContext: Lost some bluster. Now just answering questions in the hope the player will move on

138.speaker: Player
138.context: NodeContext: I refused to do what he asked. He's not amused. Icy, savage.

175.speaker: Sentinel Olak
175.text: Them's the rules. You follow 'em now or you follow 'em dead. What'll it be?
175.context: NodeContext: I refused to do what he asked. He's not amused. Icy, savage.

151.speaker: Player
151.context: NodeContext: Hard 'g' in 'ranga'. I'm waveirng on whether I'll follow his commands. He's not amused.

105.speaker: Player
105.context: NodeContext: Hard 'g' in 'ranga'. I'm waveirng on whether I'll follow his commands. He's not amused.

49.speaker: Sentinel Olak
49.text: Do it or don't, you bloody ranga!
49.context: NodeContext: Hard 'g' in 'ranga'. I'm waveirng on whether I'll follow his commands. He's not amused.

176.speaker: Player
176.text: I think I'm just going to leave.

4.speaker: Sentinel Olak
4.text: Don't remember sayin' that was an option.

167.speaker: Sentinel Olak
167.text: Your mug'll look right lovely stuck on a pike. But we'll do it up nice.

148.context: InternalNodeContext: Can flinging dung at Olek make him go blind for combat?NodeContext: Player threw dung in Olak's eyes. This leads to combat.

61.speaker: Sentinel Olak
61.context: InternalNodeContext: Can flinging dung at Olek make him go blind for combat?NodeContext: Player threw dung in Olak's eyes. This leads to combat.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: She looks fierce. Is she battle-tested?

181.speaker: Sentinel Olak
181.text: 'Course. Ripped out three bellies on our last raid alone.

157.speaker: Sentinel Olak
157.text: Hold it! You're not going anywhere. Not 'til you tell me why you're sniffin' around.

150.context: NodeContext: Goblin isn't impressed by your attempt to use fancy words in front of him. He's about to fight you.

134.speaker: Sentinel Olak
134.context: NodeContext: Goblin isn't impressed by your attempt to use fancy words in front of him. He's about to fight you.

188.speaker: Player
188.text: Glossy coat on that animal. Does she belong to the Nordiland worgata family?
188.context: NodeContext: He's suspicious but credulous. Nervous voice

217.speaker: Sentinel Olak
217.text: Well. Guess we're in with all sorts these days.
217.context: NodeContext: He disdainfully accepts that you're allies.

145.speaker: Sentinel Olak
145.text: If you're 'ere to see Dror Ragzlin, you'll wanna let 'im and the lads know you're one of us.
145.context: NodeContext: Said greasily. He's playing a trick on the player.

124.speaker: Sentinel Olak
124.text: There's a party on. Celebratin' a raid, we are. You'll need to wear our war colours.
124.context: NodeContext: Said greasily. He's playing a trick on the player.

7.context: NodeContext: He's suspicious but credulous. Nervous voice

189.speaker: Sentinel Olak
189.text: This better not be Minthara's messenger. If the boss finds out I gave her a hard time, that's me done.

106.speaker: Sentinel Olak
106.text: This better not be Minthara's messenger. If the boss finds out I gave them a hard time, that's me done.

213.speaker: Narrator
213.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*
